Ignatius flew quickly into the Trainer base carrying the nearly 
depleated Slayer. he slid the transmetal form onto the emergency cart 
and Bullet rushed him to the Medlab. Prebon slid him onto a CR Table 
and studied the readouts. technically his body was gone but the spark 
remained. As long as the spark could be saved the body wasn't 
important. "Blaze, reroute his spark to a life support system." Blaze 
didn't say a word as she did what was ordered. "Welder" Prebon called 
and a welder was immediately slapped in his hand. 

After hours of extensive surgery, a little blacksmith work and a lot 
of sweat, a new foot was attached to Slayer. From the knee down was 
all new hardware. "Replace his Energeon and reattach the spark." The 
hard part was over, now all that was left was for Blaze to stay and 
finish up. "Report to me when you're finished." Prebon was pleased 
with his work, and he knew that Blaze could be trusted to complete 
it.
